system.effect: Incense burner affixed to the backpack, helmet, or similar item. Setting it aflame with a Half Action allows it to burn for 1 hour. Whilst alight creatures with the Daemonic Trait within 3m of the bearer suffers -10 to Weapon Skill and -10 to Warp Instability Tests.
